fastpickup:
OutputLogMessage("fastpickup\n")
	PressAndReleaseKey("lshift")
	PressAndReleaseKey("lctrl")
	PressAndReleaseKey("lalt")
	PressAndReleaseKey("rshift")
	PressAndReleaseKey("rctrl")
	PressAndReleaseKey("ralt")
	PressAndReleaseKey("tab")
	Sleep(10)
	PressAndReleaseMouseButton(1)

	local lastItemCp = {
		300 / 2560 * 65535,
		1210 / 1440 * 65535
	}
	local itemHeight = 83 / 1440 * 65535

	-- 重复 3 次动作，强化拾取成功率
	for i = 1, 3 do
		for j = 1, 13 do
			MoveMouseTo(lastItemCp[1], lastItemCp[2] - itemHeight * (j - 1))
			PressMouseButton(1)
			MoveMouseTo(32767, 32767)
			ReleaseMouseButton(1)
		end
	end

	Sleep(10 )
	MoveMouseTo(lastItemCp[1], lastItemCp[2])
	PressAndReleaseKey("tab")
fastlickbox:
OutputLogMessage("fastlickbox\n")
    PressAndReleaseKey("lshift")
	PressAndReleaseKey("lctrl")
	PressAndReleaseKey("lalt")
	PressAndReleaseKey("rshift")
	PressAndReleaseKey("rctrl")
	PressAndReleaseKey("ralt")
	PressAndReleaseKey("tab")
	Sleep(10)
	PressAndReleaseMouseButton(1)

	local lastItemCp = {
		300 / 2560 * 65535,
		1210 / 1440 * 65535
	}
	local itemHeight = 83 / 1440 * 65535

	-- 重复 3 次动作，强化拾取成功率
	for i = 1, 3 do
		for j = 1, 13 do
			MoveMouseTo(lastItemCp[1], lastItemCp[2] - itemHeight * (j - 1))
			PressMouseButton(1)
			MoveMouseTo(670 / 2560 * 65535, 710 / 1440 * 65535) -- 修改为背包的坐标
			ReleaseMouseButton(1)
		end
	end

	Sleep(10)
	MoveMouseTo(lastItemCp[1], lastItemCp[2])
	PressAndReleaseKey("tab")
fastdiscard:
OutputLogMessage("fastdiscard\n")
	PressAndReleaseKey("lshift")
	PressAndReleaseKey("lctrl")
	PressAndReleaseKey("lalt")
	PressAndReleaseKey("rshift")
	PressAndReleaseKey("rctrl")
	PressAndReleaseKey("ralt")
	PressAndReleaseKey("tab")
	Sleep(10)
	PressAndReleaseMouseButton(1)
	local lastItemCp = {
		630 / 2560 * 65535,
		1210 / 1440 * 65535
	}
	local itemHeight = 83 / 1440 * 65535
	-- 清空背包 第一轮
	Sleep(10)
	for i = 1, 5 do
		for j = 1, 13 do
			MoveMouseTo(lastItemCp[1], lastItemCp[2] - itemHeight * (j - 1))
			PressMouseButton(1)
			MoveMouseTo(0, 0)
			ReleaseMouseButton(1)
		end
	end
	-- 清空武器
	Sleep(10)
	local itemPos = {
		{ 1770, 180 },
		{ 1770, 480 },
		{ 1770, 780 },
		{ 1770, 1050 },
		{ 2120, 1050 }
	}
	for i = 1, #itemPos do
		MoveMouseTo(itemPos[i][1] / 2560 * 65535, itemPos[i][2] / 1440 * 65535)
		PressAndReleaseMouseButton(3)
	end
	-- 清空背包 第二轮
	Sleep(10)
	for i = 1, 5 do
		for j = 1, 13 do
			MoveMouseTo(lastItemCp[1], lastItemCp[2] - itemHeight * (j - 1))
			PressMouseButton(1)
			MoveMouseTo(0, 0)
			ReleaseMouseButton(1)
		end
	end
	-- 清空装备
	Sleep(10)
	local itemPos2 = {
		{ 900, 392 },
		{ 900, 630 },
		{ 900, 720 },
		{ 900, 808 },
		{ 1605, 397 },
		{ 1605, 481 },
		{ 1605, 632 },
		{ 1605, 719 },
		{ 1605, 807 },
		{ 1605, 1049 },
		{ 1605, 1229 }
	}
	for i = 1, #itemPos2 do
		MoveMouseTo(itemPos2[i][1] / 2560 * 65535, itemPos2[i][2] / 1440 * 65535)
		-- Sleep(300)
		PressAndReleaseMouseButton(3)
	end
	Sleep(10)
	MoveMouseTo(lastItemCp[1], lastItemCp[2])
	PressAndReleaseKey("tab")
leftbutton:
dofile(vars["autorecognize_file"])
    vars["weapon"] = rweapon
    vars["pose"] = rpose
    vars["scope"] = rscope
    vars["a2"] = rattachment2
    vars["a3"] = rattachment3
    if not ads(vars) then
        return
    end
    start_time = GetRunningTime()
    step = 1
    xCounter=0
    yCounter=0
    dorecoil(vars)
rightbutton:
dofile(vars["autorecognize_file"])
    vars["weapon"] = rweapon
    vars["pose"] = rpose
    vars["scope"] = rscope
    vars["a2"] = rattachment2
    vars["a3"] = rattachment3

    if (vars["autoshift"] and vars["scope"] >= vars["autoshiftscope"]) or (table[vars["weapon"]] and table[vars["weapon"]]["shift"] == true) then
        Sleep3(10)
        PressKey("lshift")
    end
    if debug then
        dofile(vars["weapon_file"])
    end
    dorecoil(vars)
ads:
if vars["adsmode"] == "HOLD" then
        if not table[vars["weapon"]] or #table[vars["weapon"]]["countdatax"] == 1 then
             return (vars["left"] and vars["right"]) or (vars["left"] and vars["aim"])  or vars["right"]
        end
        return (IsMouseButtonPressed(1) and IsMouseButtonPressed(3)) or (IsMouseButtonPressed(1) and vars["aim"])
    end
    if vars["adsmode"] == "CLICK" then
        return IsMouseButtonPressed(1) and IsKeyLockOn("Capslock")
    end
dorecoil:
repeat
        ClearLog()
        log = ""
        log = log .. "---Recoil---\n"

        if current_time then
            loading_time=GetRunningTime() - current_time
            log = log .. "Loading:	" .. loading_time .. "\n"
        end

        current_time = GetRunningTime()


        movex = 0
        movey = 0


        weapon = table[vars["weapon"]]
        if weapon and IsMouseButtonPressed(1) then


            step = math.ceil(((current_time - start_time == 0 and {1} or {current_time - start_time})[1]) / weapon["speed"])


            dofile(vars["autorecognize_file"])
            vars["pose"]=rpose


            if step > #weapon["countdatay"] then	
                log = log .. "Finished \n"
                if debug[1] then
                    PressAndReleaseMouseButton(1)
                end
                return
            end

            ty = weapon["countdatay"][step]
            tx = weapon["countdatax"][step]

            movey = math.ceil((current_time - start_time) / (weapon["speed"] * step) * (ty)) - yCounter
            movex = math.ceil((current_time - start_time) / (weapon["speed"] * step) * (tx)) - xCounter


            xCounter = movex + xCounter
            yCounter = movey + yCounter


            movey = movey * weapon["scope_sensitive"][vars["scope"]] * weapon["pose_sensitive"][vars["pose"]] *weapon["attachment2_sensitive"][vars["a2"]]* weapon["attachment3_sensitive"][vars["a3"]] * sensitivityrate[1]

            log = log .."ty=" .. movey .. "=(" .. ((current_time - start_time) / (weapon["speed"] * step)) .. " * " .. ty .. "-" .. yCounter .. ") * " .. weapon["scope_sensitive"][vars["scope"]] .. "*" .. weapon["pose_sensitive"][vars["pose"]] .. "*" .. weapon["attachment2_sensitive"][vars["a2"]] .. "*" .. weapon["attachment3_sensitive"][vars["a3"]] .. "\n"
            log = log .. "tx=" .. movex .. "=" .. ((current_time - start_time) / (weapon["speed"] * step)) .. " * " .. tx .. "-" .. xCounter .. "\n"

            if debug[1] then
                movex = 3 * sensitivityrate[1]
            else
                movex = 0
            end

            if (IsMouseButtonPressed(1) and weapon["single"] == true) then
                -- 连点武器自动开启
                if (current_time - start_time)%weapon["speed"] <= loading[1]*1.5 then	
                    PressAndReleaseMouseButton(1)
                end

            elseif (IsMouseButtonPressed(1) and IsMouseButtonPressed(3)) then
                if (IsModifierPressed("lshift") and (vars["scope"] < 3)) then
                    movey = movey * 1.35
                elseif (vars["aim"]) then
                end
            elseif (vars["aim"]) then
                movey = movey * 1.3
            end
        end


        dofile(vars["autorecognize_file"])
        movey = movey + ry
        movex = rx + movex
        if not (movex == 0) then
            log = log .. rx .. ":" .. ry .. "\n" 
        end

        

        movex = math.floor(movex+0.5)
        movey = math.floor(movey+0.5)


        log = log .. "Weapon:	" .. vars["weapon"] .. "\n"
        log = log .. "Scope:	" .. vars["scope"] .. "\n"
        log = log .. "Pose:	" .. vars["pose"] .. "\n"
        log = log .. "Attachment 2:	" .. vars["a2"] .. "\n"
        log = log .. "Attachment 3:	" .. vars["a3"] .. "\n"
        log = log .. "Hold breath:	" .. tostring((vars["autoshift"] and vars["scope"] >= vars["autoshiftscope"]) or (table[vars["weapon"]] and table[vars["weapon"]]["shift"]) ) .. "\n"
        log = log .. "Step:	" .. step .. "\n"
        log = log .. "Move:	" .. movex .. ":" .. movey .. "\n"
       OutputLogMessage(log)
        if movey > 120 then
            -- move最大支持120
            movey = 120
        end

        MoveMouseRelative(movex, movey)
        Sleep3(loading[1])
    until (not (IsMouseButtonPressed(1)))
script:
EnablePrimaryMouseButtonEvents(true)

config = {{}}
vars = {{}}

dofile("{}")
bindkeys(config,vars)

function Sleep3(time)
    local a = GetRunningTime()
    while GetRunningTime()-a < time do
    end
end

function OnEvent(event, arg)
    for _,key in pairs(config["keys"]) do
	  buttonconfig = config[key]
        if arg == buttonconfig["button"] then
            match = true
            for _,modifier in pairs(buttonconfig["modifier"]) do
                if not IsModifierPressed(modifier) then
                    match = false
                end
            end
            if match then
                local func = _G[buttonconfig["funcPress"]]
                if func and event=="MOUSE_BUTTON_PRESSED" then
                    func(vars)
                    return
                else
                    func = _G[buttonconfig["funcRelease"]]
                    if func then
                        func(vars)
	    return
                    end
                end
            end
        end
    end
end
turn180:
move=100
    for i=10,1,-1 do
        MoveMouseRelative(move, 0)
    end
